thread.section_title: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Ideal Midtown Location
thread.title_full: Ideal Midtown Location - Review of Hyatt Centric Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Vivienne G
title: Ideal Midtown Location
text:
Great Location, Friendly Service, Comfortable Beds and Connollys Irish Pub next door for "The Full Irish" open from 7am... Perfect.
Walking distance to all Midtown sights and attractions, also Central Park and a few subway stops to Downtown.
Affordable Limo Service to JFK to accommodate 4 pax plus cases, tolls and tip at $75....great value.
We will definitely stay here again
